cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent

Class AgentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.AgentLoader

  • public class AgentLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to load agents from framework configuration. The agent configurations are stored inside framework configuration, after they are loaded.
    Author:
    Banzindun

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static java.util.ArrayList<AgentController> load(int team)
                                                 throws LoadingError
        Loads bots from configurations that are supplied using the framework (and stored in global configuration).
        Parameters:
        team - Number of the team.
        Returns:
        Returns array of loaded bots.
        Throws:
        LoadingError - If some of the bots could not be loaded.

      • createHero

        public static AgentController createHero(HeroConfiguration c)
                                  throws LoadingError
        Tries to load one bot form supplied configuration.
        Parameters:
        c - BotConfiguration that represents the bot.
        Returns:
        Returns the loaded bot.
        Throws:
        LoadingError - If the class couldn't be loaded.

      • setupController

        private static void setupController(AgentController bc,
                                    HeroConfiguration c)
        Setups the agent controller.
        Parameters:
        bc - Agent's controller.
        c - Agent's configuration.

      • loadAgentController

        private static BaseAgentController loadAgentController(HeroConfiguration c)
                                                throws LoadingError
        Loads an agent from configuration and creates a new BaseAgentController instance out of it.
        Parameters:
        c - Agent's configuration.
        Returns:
        Returns new agent's controller.
        Throws:
        LoadingError - Thrown if something went wrong during agent loading.

      • registerAppender

        private static void registerAppender(java.lang.String className)
        Adds QueueAppender to supplied class.
        Parameters:
        className - Class path we want to register the appender for.

      • canBeLoaded

        public static boolean canBeLoaded(HeroConfiguration c)
        Returns true if the bot can be loaded from supplied configuration. This can be used for testing the configuration.
        Parameters:
        c - BotConfiguration of the loaded bot.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the bot can be loaded.
